body:
Comment 8 by **dgrijalva@ngmoco.com**: 
I don't think you can safely apply a default to file access.  At the very least, you
want the programmer to have to do something much more explicit.  Something like

myTransport.RegisterProtocol("file", &FileRoundTripper{BasePath: "/my/base/path"})

no?

The idea that an import statement can make the default behavior expose the filesystem is
scary.
